Claude Clark (November 11, 1915 eprel 21, 2001) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na ónyé nkụzi nka
Isiokwu Clark bụ diaspora nke ọdịbendị ndị Africa America, gụnyere ebe ịgba egwú, urchins n'okporo ámá, ndụ mmiri, ọdịdị ala, na ihe oyiyi okpukpe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ejiri mma palette gbuo.
A mụrụ Claude Clark n'ugbo na Rockingham, Georgia na Nọvemba 11, 1915
Na mbido Ọgọst 1923, nne na nna Clark hapụrụ ndịda màkà ndụ ka mma na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania n'oge Great Migration
Clark gàrà Roxborough High School ébé o dere uri mana ọ chọpụtakwara nkà màkà ise ihe. Ónyé nkuzi Sunday School ya gbara ya ume igosi na klas Sunday school na chọọchị.
Claude Clark gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Roxborough High School
Site na 1935 ruo 1939, Clark gụrụ akwụkwọ na Philadelphia Museum School of Industrial Art (mgbè e mesịrị Mahadum nke Arts) na agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke
Mgbè ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ hụrụ ọrụ Van Gogh
Ụdị na usoro Van Gogh bụ ihe ndabere nke ụzọ Clark si ese ihe na eserese, nke nwéré ọdịdị dị omimi na-acha uhie uhie ma na-etinye ihe osise na-enweghị isi site na iji mma palette.
Clark tozuru oke na nka site n'ịghọta ohere ya ịzụlite n'enweghị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ịda ogbenye na enweghị nhata nke ajọ mbunobi na ákàrà na-eweta
Ọrụ ya gosipụtara eziokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ụdị ọgbara ọhụrụ na nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe
Mgbè Clark enweghị ike ịzụta ihe osise, ọ chụpụrụ ite ihe osise site na ihe mkpofu n'azụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nka ma gwakọta nke ya
N'enweghị ike ịzụta brọsh na kemịkal iji sachaa ha, ọ maara iji mma palette
N'afọ 1955, mgbè ọ na-akụzi na Talladega, Clark malitere inwe mmetụta nkè nrụgide ego wee mee mkpebi ịkwaga ezinụlọ ya na steeti nwunye ya nke California iji chọọ ohere ka ukwuu
Clark debanyere aha na Mahadum Steeti Sacramento ma kụziere ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na-agụsị akwụkwọ nka ka ọ na-enweta nzèrè Bachelor of Arts n'otu ógè ahụ

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1958, Clark nabatara ọkwa nkụzi nka na Alameda County, California (1958-1967) ma mesịa nweta ọkwa ngalaba n'ime usoro Mahadum California dị ka ónyé nkụzi nka (Merritt College, 1968-1981).
